title: Plants vs Zombies 1.01 [Mac]
description:
PopCap Plants vs Zombies for Mac

An all-new action-strategy game from PopCap, makers of Bejeweled and
Peggle!

Zombies are invading your home, and the only defense is your arsenal of
plants! Armed with an alien nursery-worth of zombie-zapping plants like
peashooters and cherry bombs, you'll need to think fast and plant faster
to stop dozens of types of zombies dead in their tracks. Obstacles like a
setting sun, creeping fog and a swimming pool add to the challenge, and
with five game modes to dig into, the fun never dies!

* Play five game modes: Adventure, Mini-Games, Puzzle, Survival, plus
the stress-free Zen Garden

* Open the Almanac to see all the plants and zombies, plus amusing

* Amazing graphics and soundtrack, plus a bonus music video
* Infinite replayability: the game is never the same experience twice!

I made this version using this torrent (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4927928/Plants_vs_Zombies__%5BKTB%5D_-_Mac_OSX_%28Repack%29) and the demo version.

It seems to be more stable and it doesn't crash after level completion.

Tested on Mac OS X 10.6.2
